results.description: The Manager Technology Application will be responsible for ensuring the overall integration and design of the innovative PWNT technology into a client’s application within the project management goals. The position is within PWNT’s Operations Unit and will have 6 direct reports, all engineers specialized in process design and project engineering. Most important is that you have an impressive engineering background and a broad perspective of design and process engineering, project management and…
